tabs.name: Inflow
bullets: Warm humid air flows inward, speeding up as it approaches the eyewall

tabs.name: Rainbands
bullets: Rainbands typically are 3-30 miles wide and up tp 300 miles long
Rainbands produce heavy rainfall, as much as 25 cm (10 in.) per hour

tabs.name: Eye & Eyewall
bullets: Eye: Light winds, partly cloudy or clear skies. Average diameters 20-50 km
Eyewall: Heaviest precipitation and strongest winds

tabs.name: Outflow
bullets: Air flowing out from the center of the storm (Outflow)
Air sinking into storm center, warming and suppressing clouds. Winds are calm
